synopsis.text: Mustafa, a white leopard, and Li Ren Fang, a childhood friend, are Kajika Burnsworth's only companions on the secluded island of Giviolle. Kajika's mother died saving her from an assassination attempt when she was just two, leading her industrialist father, Harry Burnsworth, to send her away for her safety. Now, at fourteen, Kajika returns to her father's side, only to be thrust into a game to find her future husband. Harry has selected three exceptional men for Kajika to choose from, but she must identify them and win their hearts without their knowledge of the game. The chosen man must willingly accept her as his bride, revealing Kajika's true fate, which even she is unaware of. Amidst the backdrop of political intrigue, international oil, and wealth distribution, Kajika must navigate this game of love, loyalty, and friendship, where the stakes are higher than she could ever imagine. Will she uncover her secret and find true love? Only time will tell in this thrilling tale of Hanasakeru Seishonen.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
